snippet: Mr. Bush, who will declare his candidacy for president on Monday, has shown a depth of knowledge and curiosity for which his brother, former President George W. Bush, was not known.
abstract: Jeb Bush, who appears poised to formally throw his hat in 2016 presidential race, makes impression on European leaders during his visit there; displays depth of knowledge and curiosity that several diplomats say distinguishes him from his brother, former Pres George W Bush.

byline.contributor: Alison Smale contributed reporting from Berlin, and Joanna Berendt and Rick Lyman from Warsaw.

lead_paragraph: Mr. Bush, who will declare his candidacy for president on Monday, has shown a depth of knowledge and curiosity for which his brother, former President George W. Bush, was not known.

headline.main: In Europe, Leaders Take Note: Jeb Bush Isn’t His Brother
headline.print_headline: Bush Distances Himself in Europe From Brother
